formula: a(n)=sum(m=1..n, sum(i=0..n-m, binomial(n,i+m)*(m^(n-i-m)*(sum(k=0..i+m, stirling2(i+m,k+m)*2^(i-k)*binomial(k+m-1,m-1)*(k+m)!*(-1)^(k+n-i-m)))))/m!), n>0, a(0)=1. [Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 06 2011]
mathematica: Exp[ Tanh[ x ]/Exp[ x ] ]CoefficientList[Series[E^(Tanh[x]/E^x), {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015 *)
